question: Which country hosts the annual "M'era Luna Festival"?
explanation: Germany hosts the annual "M'era Luna Festival". The M'era Luna is an alternative music festival that encompasses a number of different styles such as metal, future pop, aggrotech, synthpop, gothic rock, darkwave, and electronic body music. It is held annually on the second weekend of every August, in Hildesheim, Germany. The M'era Luna includes camping facilities and has two stages: a large rock festival style structure, erected for the show each year, and a former aircraft hangar. M'era Luna is one of the biggest dark music events in Germany.
